classpath:serverest/produtos/Products.feature:11

steps.name: def randomName = function(){ return 'Product ' + new Date().getTime() }

elements.name: CT09 - Work with complex JSON data

steps.name: def cheapProducts = karate.filter(response.produtos, function(x){ return x.preco < 100 })
def mediumProducts = karate.filter(response.produtos, function(x){ return x.preco >= 100 && x.preco < 500 })
def expensiveProducts = karate.filter(response.produtos, function(x){ return x.preco >= 500 })
match grouping contains { cheap: '#array', medium: '#array', expensive: '#array' }

comments: # Create a product that will be associated with a cart

comments: # Create a non-admin user and login to create a cart

comments: # Ensure no existing cart for this user
# Create a cart including the created product

path '/produtos/' + productId
comments: # Try to delete the product and expect an error because it is in a cart

steps.name: match response.message == 'Não é permitido excluir produto que faz parte de carrinho'
